title: 4 Pieces Christmas Plaid Porch Sign Banner Welcome Hanging Sign with Snowflake Reindeer Snowman Tree Pattern for Christmas Indoor Outdoor Decorations
features: Package includes: you will receive 4 pieces banner, include 1 x "WELCOME" banner, 12 x 40 inch (LW), 1 x "HOLLY" banner, 12 x 72 inch (LW), 1 x "JOLLY" banner, 12 x 72 inch (LW), 1 x "JOY" banner, 12 x 12 inch (LW), 4 pieces of 1 m red ropes, a good set for Christmas decoration

Design for Christmas: this set contains many classic Christmas elements, snowflake, Christmas tree, reindeer, snowman and "Welcome" letter, full of Christmas lively and warm atmosphere, nice decoration for your space

Easy to hang: each banner come with pole and rope, you can assemble them easily, the "WELCOME" banner has 4 holes for compatible red rope, so that they are not easily blown and twisted by the wind and can remain stable

Durable and reusable: the Christmas porch sign banners are made polyester fabric, anti-wear and easy to wash, not easy to fade, the banner poles are made of plastic, durable enough and not easy to break, can serve for a long time using

Applicable occasions: essential decoration for Christmas, you can hang them on front door, ceilings, windows, gardens and so on, after use, it's also easy to store, just simply rotate the banner and store it anywhere you want for next year's using
description: The words printed on the banner are just expressing blessing, not as trademark.
